abstract: NFL Roundup; Indianapolis Colts defeat Houston Texans, 27-20; Colts wide receiver Andre Johnson, who was released by Texans in March, has two touchdown catches; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Thanks to two touchdown catches by Johnson, the Indianapolis Colts beat the Texans in Houston, 27-20, on Thursday.

headline.main: Colts’ Andre Johnson Shines in a Homecoming Victory at Houston
headline.print_headline: Johnson Returns to Houston, and the Colts Leave Happy

snippet: Thanks to two touchdown catches by Johnson, the Indianapolis Colts beat the Texans in Houston, 27-20, on Thursday.
